title: Newtons second law - net force on two-block system

content.prompt: A system consists of two identical blocks connected by a rod of negligible mass. At the instant shown, the velocity of the center of mass is zero and the system has a nonzero acceleration to the right. Which of the following statements must be true?

choices.label: The net force on the system is zero.
The net force on the right block is greater than the net force on the left block.
There is a net force exerted on the system directed to the left.
There is a net force exerted on the system directed to the right.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
